mapper.select: select b.bid bid, b.bpic bpic,b.bname bname,b.bauthor bauthor from book b join collects c on c.usid=#{usid} and b.bid=c.bid
select c.bid,count(*) a from collects c group by c.bid
select b.bid,b.bname,b.bauthor,b.bdate,b.bpic from book b order by b.bdate desc

select b.bid,b.bname,b.bdate,b.bpic,b.bauthor from book b where (to_char(bdate,'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) and (to_char(bdate,'mm') = to_char(sysdate,'mm')) and (to_char(bdate,'dd') = to_char(sysdate,'dd'))
select b.bid,b.bname,b.bdate,b.bpic,b.bauthor from book b where (to_char(bdate,'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) and (to_char(bdate,'mm') = to_char(sysdate,'mm'))
select bdate,b.bname,b.bauthor,b.bdate,b.bpic from book b where to_char(sysdate,'mm') - to_char(bdate,'mm') in (2,1,0) and (to_char(bdate,'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')) order by b.bdate desc
select b.bname,b.bauthor,b.bdate,b.bpic from book b order by b.bdate desc
